catalog_info.title: Vocal Production for the Stage
catalog_info.notes: Enrollment determined by short interviews to be conducted on the first day of class.
catalog_info.description: Whether one is performing in a play, speaking professionally, teaching a class or leading a group, the ability to use one's voice effectively is a primary element of the success of the presentation. Using several major techniques of speaking training, students learn not only how to use the voice, but how these various approaches to voice training correspond to specific performance challenges.
